title: Cause of video play count error

content.question: Which of the following is the most likely explanation for the error?

choices.label: The count for the video became larger than the maximum value allowed by the data type used to store the count.
The mathematical operations used to calculate the count caused a rounding error to occur.
The software used to update the count failed when too many videos were played simultaneously by too many users.
The software used to update the count contained a sampling error when using digital data to approximate the analog count.

content.answer: The count for the video became larger than the maximum value allowed by the data type used to store the count.
